thread.title: Kimmel jokes Rob Kardashian is new Supreme Court Justice
thread.title_full: Kimmel jokes Rob Kardashian is new Supreme Court Justice | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.com
title: Kimmel jokes Rob Kardashian is new Supreme Court Justice
text:
Well, he did go to law school.
In what Jimmy Kimmel has branded 'the most shocking edition of Lie Witness News yet', he had his team tell people Donald Trump had nominated Robert Kardashian to be a Supreme Court Justice.
Seven people in a row believed the late show host's crew in the segment shown on Jimmy Kimmel Live! on Thursday night, with some being outraged while another even thinking the reality star's relationship with Blac Chyna might help relations between China and the USA.
Scroll down for video
Fake news indeed: In what Jimmy Kimmel has branded 'the most shocking edition of Lie Witness News yet', he had his team tell people Donald Trump had nominated Robert Kardashian to be a Supreme Court Justice
All this comes despite the President's very public announcement that Neil Gorsuch was his pick for the highest federal court in the country just days earlier.
Introducing his engagement - which has previously poked fun at hipsters for pretending to like fake bands at Coachella - even Kimmel was blown away by people's responses to the fake news Rob could by a Supreme Court Justice.
He told the audience after revealing seven people in a row believed the news: 'So, with that said, I am both proud and deeply ashamed to present what could very well be our most shocking edition of Lie Witness News yet.'
The first woman claimed to have seen the announcement that Rob was up for SCOTUS: 'Honestly, I was a little shocked, a little taken aback but I look at it as whatever happens, happens for a reason.'
He did go to law school: Seven people in a row believed the late show host's crew that Rob (pictured last year) had been nominated in the segment shown on Jimmy Kimmel Live! on Thursday night
Was not a small announcement: All this comes despite the President's very public announcement that Neil Gorsuch was his pick for the highest federal court in the country just days earlier
Shocked: Introducing his engagement - which has previously poked fun at hipsters for pretending to like fake bands at Coachella - even Kimmel was blown away by people's responses to the fake news Rob could by a Supreme Court Justice
But she said a reality star has no place in politics: 'Because I feel reality is biased and can be twisted to be perceived to be one way or another and in order to be on the justice system you have to be facts and no opinions. [sic]'
Her pink-haired pal said she was a Trump supporter but was shocked by his 'decision'.
The young woman said: 'Honestly, that was the first wrong move I've ever heard him make as president because if he's really going to do this he should bring somebody who is that famous into this.
Did you though? The first woman claimed to have seen the announcement that Rob was up for SCOTUS, 'Honestly, I was a little shocked, a little taken aback but I look at it as whatever happens, happens for a reason'
Confused: The woman's pink-haired pal said she was a Trump supporter but was shocked by his 'decision'
'[Rob] doesn't know anything about politics, he doesn't know anything about nationalism, he doesn't know anything about what's going on he's in his bubble.'
She continued to say the reality world should not being policies without realizing Trump is also a reality star but she did not rule out more Kardashians joining the Supreme Court bench.
'The only one that has a half a brain would be Khloe or Kourtney.'
Reality stars should not be politicians: The woman argued as a celebrity Rob was not in touch, and 'doesn't know anything about politics, he doesn't know anything about nationalism, he doesn't know anything about what's going on he's in his bubble'
Different pick: The pink haired woman and another man thought Kourtney Kardashian would have been a much better Supreme Court Justice
Kourtney was her pick as was another man's, who said: 'Kourtney would have made a great Supreme Court Justice because I think out of all the Kardashians she seems to be the one with the best grip on reality.'
One man was very supportive of Trump's decision saying the reality star and law student was qualified as he 'is a people person and he'll keep the people's interests at heart'.
The man also felt like Rob's relationship with Blac Chyna help America's relationship with the country of China.
Make Rob Great Again: One man was very supportive of Trump's decision saying the reality star and law student was qualified as he 'is a people person and he'll keep the people's interests at heart'
Only one letter difference: The man also felt like Rob's relationship with Blac Chyna help America's relationship with the country of China
The man told the late show: 'I'm going to say it can't hurt. It can help its just an open door for communication, communication is important.'
The horrifying and amusing segment certainly got 'Supreme Court Justice nominee' Rob Kardashian's approval, with the star sharing the video on his Instagram.
The star shared the clip with lots of laughing so hard I'm crying emojis.
Model for diplomacy: The man told the late show, 'I'm going to say it can't hurt. It can help its just an open door for communication, communication is important'
